page.title: 14CHURCHES IN BENTHAM
page.content: Bentham has six churches.{High Bentham St Margaret's. Church of England. Foundation stone laid 1833. Vicar Nigel Kinsella. 100 on roll, 30 children. St Boniface. R.C. Established 1866. Present church built 1959. Priest John Cairns. 150 members, 30 children. Methodist Chapel. Built 1905. Original Wesleyan Church in Main St. 70 members, 40 children. Minister Jennifer Lunn. {Low Bentham}Methodist Chapel. 20 members. St John's. C.of E. Oldest church in the area. First Rector 1300. 60 on roll. Friends Meeting House, Quakers, built in 1772, established 1680. Records of Quakers placed under stone denoting old burial ground in 1885. 16 members.
